content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

  • See Every Detail Day and Night Experience 2K high resolution for crystal-clear clarity. Even in low-light conditions, our F1.6 wide aperture lens delivers full-color and infrared night vision, ensuring you capture every detail.
  • Endless Power by the Sun Use the sun’s energy with our 3W solar panel featuring ETFE for maximum efficiency. The wireless battery camera is equipped with a long-lasting rechargeable 5200mAh battery (Can last up to 1 month when fully charged), providing continuous protection without the need for battery replacement or frequent recharging, ensuring cost-saving efficiency.
  • 360° Coverage, One-Tap for Panorama. Save the panoramic view of your surroundings with ease. Explore every angle instantly with a simple one-tap, no need for long clicks to rotate the camera. Benefit from a 360° horizontal view and a 136° vertical view for comprehensive coverage.
  • Precise Detection, Total Control. Ensure maximum protection with motion detection and scheduled siren & light alarms specifically for human detection. Safeguard your privacy with clear two-way audio and voice modulation. Seamlessly integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant for convenient voice commands and enjoy a stable wireless connection through 2.4GHz Wi-Fi.
  • Reliable & Optional Storage. Enjoy a one-year free trial of cloud storage, providing up to 48 hours of event video history. Alternatively, opt for local storage with support for up to a 128GB MicroSD card.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered:
• 2K 3MP HD
  • 5200mAh Rechargeable Battery
  • 360° Smart Tracking
  • AI Human Detection
  • IP65 Weatherproof
  • Solar Panel Compatible
  • Full-Color Night Vision
